Description: After the conveyor belt stops for 3 seconds the red and green lights blink alternately and a short beep is triggered
The moment the robotic gripper reaches its end position all indicators on the left and right should start flashing and a continuous tone is emitted
If the emergency button is pressed the system stops immediately and the siren starts after 2 seconds
Once the loading arm stays in place for more than 4 seconds the lights flash on the left and middle sides only and two acoustic signals are played
As soon as the manipulator stabilizes both the left and right lights activate and an alert tone is issued
